text:
The diggers are returning to Seaford beach! 

Phase 1 of shingle recycling starts on the 26 Oct and will take around 4 weeks to complete. 

This work is carried out by the @EnvAgencySE and is essential to help protect the town from coastal #flooding

https://t.co/b0MiqrDFXo https://t.co/PT6n9zFpgI
RT @EnvAgencyMids: We're working with @BTP3Counties and @Glos_Police on a joint operation to investigate this illegal waste activity in #Gl‚Ä¶

RT @HiddenNorfolk: Natural works of art, restored chalk rivers in Norfolk at dusk  also known as natural capital. Shares on offer at Norfol‚Ä¶

RT @BTPBhm: Officers joined forces with partner agencies last week to tackle metal & cable theft.

We work with regional forces, @NCA_UK @n‚Ä¶
RT @Feargal_Sharkey: Clarification, if ever needed, that the @EnvAgency has finally given up all pretence of actually caring for or even de‚Ä¶

RT @Feargal_Sharkey: And we all know, don‚Äôt we boys and girls, that @thameswater aren‚Äôt the only ones dumping sewage into local rivers.

@D‚Ä¶

Natural works of art, restored chalk rivers in Norfolk at dusk  also known as natural capital. Shares on offer at Norfolk Rivers Trust and @AquiferChalk @WildTroutTrust @WWF @theriverstrust @SalmonTroutCons @AnglianWater @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency Let the sun shine on this asset https://t.co/mAyzWZNX8g
@cmoncrieff1 @DrElaineKing @CDP @EnvAgency @waitrose Why did the WWF bale out of the sewage pollution battle after doing such a great job with Flushed Away in 2017?

text: always nice to see the range of people using #KersalWetlands, runners,cyclist,nature lovers, dog walkers, families out for a stroll & @unitedutilities & @EnvAgencyNW carrying site maintenance work https://t.co/bfRWAOMWo6

RT @SPavelle: BEAVER‚ÄôS WILL HELP REDUCE THE FLOODS. GIVE BRITAIN MORE BEAVER. 

We don‚Äôt need more trains and bridges. We need to rally the‚Ä¶

Stairway to heaven? Ok technically descending but this permits safe access to @EnvAgencySW gauging station at #Cowley on the River Creedy - important for floodwarning in #Exeter. 

Not all aspects of our sites are about #hydrometry! https://t.co/168Een6kQy

urls.title: Cavity Nest - Finding Nature a Home | British Made
urls.description: Cavity Wall Nesting Boxes provide the ideal nesting and roosting solution for many of our UK and visiting small to medium cavity nesting birds.

text: @EnvAgency why can we not get a policy whereby new homes have https://t.co/SYD0sfCqRf installed being that only 20 have been fitted in two years nationwide. NHBC approved and tested effective @2ManyHouses
RT @cmoncrieff1: I know from @CDP data that companies aren't doing enough to address water pollution....disappointed it's happening in rare‚Ä¶

I know from @CDP data that companies aren't doing enough to address water pollution....disappointed it's happening in rare chalk streams, Britain's "burning rainforests". Good to see @EnvAgency @waitrose stepping up. https://t.co/4fRsYF9bpG
